trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Augusta
There were no other sightings in Augusta on or around April 11th 2006
Summary: 2 glimmering reddish/orange objects appeared in southwest sky
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on a short break at work in the company smoking area when 2 lights appeared , first one "faded" in, then another. They hovered without moving, then one object "faded" out, then the other. It was also witnessed by a co-worker. The duration was @ 30 seconds. We continued to watch the area, but no more activity was detected from our viewpoint. From my point of view it appeared as if they were hovering over Fort Gordon Military installation, but I can't verify this, as I couldn't determine the exact distance. II only have the other witnesses' name and don't actually know her personally, only by acquaintance on the job.
